about_the_game:
Drive, Relax, and Let Go

Step into a world where driving is not just a means to an end but an experience in itself. In this game, you take the wheel and immerse yourself in serene landscapes to the sound of a carefully curated lo-fi soundtrack designed to bring calm and tranquility.

Whether exploring an open world filled with winding roads, hills, forests, and charming small towns, or tackling the infinite road where every mile is a new chance to relax and lose yourself in thought, this game is your perfect digital retreat.

Key Features:
🚗 Free Exploration & Infinite Road – Feel free to forge your path or challenge yourself with an endless journey where the horizon is your only limit.
🎵 Immersive Lo-Fi Soundtrack – Let relaxing music set the perfect atmosphere to unwind.
🌅 Stunning Landscapes – Experience the beauty of dynamic environments with subtle light changes throughout the day, offering unique scenery with every drive.
🌌 Calm & Introspective Atmosphere – Designed to soothe, perfect for moments when you need to breathe deeply and enjoy the present.
🕹️ Simple & Intuitive Controls – Easy-to-use controls let you focus on the experience, providing a seamless and immersive drive.

No pressure, no timers, no urgent missions. Just you, the road, and the music. If you’re looking for a game to slow down, find inner peace, and simply enjoy the ride, this is your place.

Put on your headphones, start the engine, and let the road guide you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 TI or another graphics card with 4gb vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 8GB or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Drive through serene landscapes to the sound of relaxing lo-fi. Choose to explore a vast open world or follow an endless road, with no rush, no limits. With stunning graphics, simple controls, and a calm atmosphere, this is the perfect game to relax and enjoy the journey.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
